author.bio:
Goodbye. https://ruqqus.com/+The_Cabal/post/d9y9/i-told-you-so-all-the

Remember: History repeats, and the unaware are doomed to repeat it.

body:
To do this, click on your user menu at the top of the page, and click the button that says "invite friends". It will copy a link to your clipboard, which you can send to your friends and invite them to join Ruqqus. The more people that do this the bigger Ruqqus will get.

As a reward for telling people about Ruqqus, you'll receive a badge on your profile for being a recruiter, as well as a recruiter title that you could choose to be displayed next to your username.

If anyone has trouble getting the link, you can use this one instead (make sure to replace "username" with your own username or else it won't count!): https://ruqqus.com/signup?ref=username
body_html:
To do this, click on your user menu at the top of the page, and click the button that says "invite friends". It will copy a link to your clipboard, which you can send to your friends and invite them to join Ruqqus. The more people that do this the bigger Ruqqus will get.

As a reward for telling people about Ruqqus, you'll receive a badge on your profile for being a recruiter, as well as a recruiter title that you could choose to be displayed next to your username.

If anyone has trouble getting the link, you can use this one instead (make sure to replace "username" with your own username or else it won't count!): https://ruqqus.com/signup?ref=username

guild.description:
The official guild for all things Ruqqus.

Rules:

💻 No promotion of other sites that aren't a fork of Ruqqus

🟪 Ruqqus-related only. This is a community dedicated to Ruqqus meta discussion. Content may involve technology and politics but must have ample context in Ruqqus.

📬 No spamming. Spamming comments or posts is not allowed.

😀 Be civil. Be nice. Harassment, trolling, and disruptive behavior is not allowed. Basically, don’t be a jerk.

📜 Follow Ruqqus ToS. This is a given.

For press releases, visit +RuqqusPress.

For updates and patch notes, visit +changelog.

For ideas and feedback, visit +BetaFeedback

For bug reports, visit +RuqqusBugs

The official guild for all things Ruqqus.

📬 No spamming. Spamming comments or posts is not allowed.

😀 Be civil. Be nice. Harassment, trolling, and disruptive behavior is not allowed. Basically, don’t be a jerk.

📜 Follow Ruqqus ToS. This is a given.

For press releases, visit +RuqqusPress.

For updates and patch notes, visit +changelog.

For ideas and feedback, visit +BetaFeedback

For bug reports, visit +RuqqusBugs

title: PSA: To help Ruqqus grow as a platform, you can get a link to invite your friends to join, and you'll recieve an award for doing so.
